message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for this product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
